onDraw().Description: Callback method to be invoked when the view tree is about to be drawn. At this point, views cannot be modified in any way. Unlike with @B_android#view#ViewTreeObserver#OnPreDrawListener_E@, this method cannot be used to cancel the current drawing pass. An @B_android#view#ViewTreeObserver#OnDrawListener_E@ listener

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the view tree is about to be drawn.
